So, Terminator Genisys has not started its publicity tour yet,...
...but Arnold has begun doing some interesting rounds to get people excited.
The actor recently pranked people in Hollywood pretending to be the Terminator.
You want to come with me?
Schwarzenegger actually posed as a wax statue...
...at Madame Tussauds at Hollywood and Highland,...
...and quite a few people didn't believe it was actually him.
He also confronted a Terminator impersonator on Hollywood Boulevard,...
...and believe it or not, they had an "I'll be back" off.
